messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschooling and belly dancing
messages.msgSnippet: ... I don t know if she s on this list, but yes, Lori Upchurch does both those things and lives in Chicago. Wish I d been listening yesterday! Paula
messages.messageBody:
on 2/28/05 11:32 AM, Gold Standard at jacki@... wrote:

> Is there a Lori out there who belly dances and unschools?


I don't know if she's on this list, but yes, Lori Upchurch does both those
things and lives in Chicago. Wish I'd been listening yesterday!

Paula

messages.subject: unschooling and belly dancing
messages.msgSnippet: Is there a Lori out there who belly dances and unschools? With a last name that starts with Up? I was listening to a repeat show on NPR of Michael Feldman s
messages.messageBody:
Is there a Lori out there who belly dances and unschools? With a last name
that starts with Up? I was listening to a repeat show on NPR of Michael
Feldman's "Whaddya Know?" while weeding yesterday and he introduced a woman
Lori from the audience who UNschools and belly dances.

If you're out there Lori, I thought you represented us well. Simple, pointed
answers to Michael's slightly obnoxious questions. And I wouldn't have belly
danced for him either!

Jacki, who was so pleasantly surprised to hear the word "unschooling" on an
NPR show
